    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    Represents a Bishop chess piece.
    Board
    Represents a chess board and manages the placement and movement of pieces.
    Color
    Represents the color of a chess piece.
    Game
    Controls the flow of a chess game.
    InvalidLocationException
    Exception thrown when an invalid chess board location is specified.
    InvalidMoveException
    Exception thrown when an invalid chess move is attempted.
    King
    Represents a King chess piece.
    Knight
    Represents a Knight chess piece.
    Location
    Represents a location on the chess board.
    Main
    Entry point for the chess game application.
    Pawn
    Represents a Pawn chess piece.
    Piece
    Abstract base class for all chess pieces.
    Queen
    Represents a Queen chess piece.
    Rook
    Represents a Rook chess piece.
